healthcare.headline: Automated patient triage for a hospital network
healthcare.description: The bot resolves repetitive enquiries, pre-qualifies appointment requests and relieves the hotline teams.
healthcare.result: Launched in 14 days including DPA, role-based access and audit logging.

retail.headline: Conversational checkout for a D2C fashion brand
retail.description: The WhatsApp bot guides shoppers through product advice, payment options and delivery notifications – 24/7.
metrics: 23% higher recovery rate for abandoned carts
€8.4k additional monthly revenue from automated upsells
retail.result: Stripe, PayPal, Apple Pay and Klarna run end-to-end without manual handover.

agency.headline: Scalable white-label offer for a digital agency
agency.description: The agency delivers ready-to-use bots to 18 clients in six weeks with branded dashboards and reporting.
agency.result: Multi-tenant billing, support workflows and performance insights in one place.

security.title: Security and compliance by design
security.subtitle: EU-hosted infrastructure, independent audits and transparent documentation.
features: PCI DSS Level 1 payment processing via Stripe and PayPal
End-to-end TLS encryption and optional isolated at-rest buckets
Tamper-proof audit logs, role-based approvals and activity monitoring
assurance: Hosting in Frankfurt (eu-central-1) with daily geo-redundant backups
Ready-to-sign Data Processing Agreement and TOM documentation
Quarterly penetration tests plus continuous automated security scans

recommended.supabase-analyst-agent: Activate the Supabase analyst and capture results as a knowledge module.
recommended.hetzner-ops-agent: Trigger the Hetzner Ops agent for infrastructure review and update the documentation.
recommended.frontend-diagnostics-agent: Let the frontend diagnostics agent run UI checks and codify the learnings.
recommended.default: Start an expert session in the MCP and store the outcome as a new knowledge module.

healthcare.title: Automated triage across 7 clinics
healthcare.description: Patient requests are pre-qualified, routed to the right medical teams and documented in the EMR without manual copy & paste.
healthcare.result: Integration covers DPA-compliant storage, handover to staff and role-based approvals in under two weeks.

retail.title: Conversational checkout for a fashion brand
retail.description: Product advice, payments and shipping updates run inside WhatsApp, while Stripe and PayPal track every transaction.
retail.result: Playbooks bundle product feed sync, multi-lingual copy and analytics dashboards for marketing teams.

agency.title: White-label automation offering
agency.description: A digital agency onboards 18 client bots in six weeks, including branding, invoicing and customer success dashboards.

auth.invalidEmailMessage: Please enter a valid email address.

emailVerificationFailed.title: Email Verification Failed
emailVerificationFailed.description: The confirmation link is invalid or expired. This can happen if:
emailVerificationFailed.reason1: The link was already used once
emailVerificationFailed.reason2: The link was waited for too long (more than 24 hours)
emailVerificationFailed.reason3: The link points to the wrong domain
emailVerificationFailed.resendPrompt: Would you like to receive a new confirmation email at {email}?
emailVerificationFailed.enterEmail: Enter your email address to receive a new confirmation email:
emailVerificationFailed.resendSuccessMessage: Please check your inbox for the new confirmation link.
emailVerificationFailed.resendError: The email could not be resent.
emailVerificationFailed.invalidEmailMessage: Please enter a valid email address.
emailVerificationFailed.supabaseConfigMessage: If the link points to localhost:3000, the Site URL in the Supabase Dashboard must be changed to https://whatsapp.owona.de.

auth.verifyOtpDescription: Enter the OTP code from your email.
auth.otpHint: Enter the 6-digit code from your email.
auth.otpExpired: The OTP code has expired. Please request a new one.
auth.passwordUpdatedMessage: Your password has been successfully updated. You will be redirected to login.
auth.passwordSameAsOld: The new password must be different from the old one.
auth.passwordWeakMessage: The password does not meet security requirements.
auth.passwordsDoNotMatchMessage: The entered passwords do not match.
auth.sessionExpiredMessage: Your session has expired. Please start the password reset process again.
auth.resetPasswordError: An error occurred. Please try again.
auth.passwordResetEmailSent: We have sent you an email to reset your password.
auth.passwordResetFailed: Error sending email. Please try again.
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

support.title: Create a support ticket
support.subtitle: Describe the problem and we will follow up as soon as possible.
support.disclaimer: All information is handled in compliance with GDPR.

statusOverview.heading: What happens next
statusOverview.personal: We personalise every reply and keep it aligned with your ticket status.
statusOverview.escalation: After your first follow-up we escalate automatically to Tier 2.
statusOverview.updates: You receive proactive status updates whenever something changes.

form.title: Title
form.descriptionPlaceholder: What happened? Please include steps or links if possible.
form.metadataNotice: Technical details (browser, page, timestamp) are attached automatically to speed up troubleshooting.

success.title: Ticket submitted
success.message: Thank you! Our support team will get back to you shortly.
success.nextSteps: You will receive a confirmation shortly and we push status updates once Tier 2 starts working on your ticket.

errors.requiredMessage: Please fill in all mandatory fields before submitting the ticket.
errors.submitMessage: Please try again or contact us via email.

inbox.title: Support inbox
inbox.subtitle: Track your open tickets and respond to our support team in real time.
inbox.emptyDescription: Great! If something breaks, click the button below and we will jump in for you.
inbox.replyPlaceholder: Write an update for our support team…

silentCheck.running: Let me check that for you…
silentCheck.paymentStatusOk: Payments look healthy. No pending webhook failures.
silentCheck.deploymentHealthy: Deployment and services are running as expected.
silentCheck.uiTraceCaptured: Captured a UI trace. Our team will review the details.
silentCheck.error: Check failed. Please try again later.

inbox.autoEscalated: Reply saved – the ticket was escalated to Tier 2 automatically.

compliance.title: Meta WhatsApp Compliance
compliance.metaGuidelinesDescription: General conversational chatbots are no longer allowed. Bots must have a specific business use case (e.g., customer service, bookings, e-commerce).

geoViewer.title: Preview websites from any country
geoViewer.description: Enter a URL and render it through a country-specific proxy to validate localisation, compliance banners and personalised content.
geoViewer.urlHelp: The address must start with http:// or https://.
geoViewer.countryHelp: We will retrieve the page via a proxy in the selected country.
geoViewer.loadingPreview: Contacting the proxy and rendering the page…
geoViewer.previewSubtitle: Result rendered via ScrapingBee’s geo proxy.
geoViewer.emptyState: Enter a URL and choose a country to start the preview.

errors.urlMissing: Please enter a valid URL first.
errors.generic: We could not load the requested page. Please try again.

geoViewer.errorPreview: The preview could not be rendered. Adjust the URL or pick another country.
